document.full_text: the right-hander phil hughes, who has been plagued by a lack of arm strength this season, does not have a rare neurovascular condition as had been feared.
document.title: doctor rules out rare disorder in hughes's arm
lines_and_colors: the right-hander phil hughes, who has been plagued by a lack of arm strength this season, does not have a rare neurovascular condition as had been feared.
